rules.natural: If the government implements the policy, then the policy is successful.

Provided that there is effective implementation of the policy, if it is not the case that the executive's approval of the policy does not lead to a successful policy, then the policy faces a legal challenge, and the policy is not upheld by the court.
Whenever the implementation meets the deadline, effective implementation of the policy follows.
Either the implementation meets the deadline, or the implementation has an extended deadline.
In the event that the implementation has an extended deadline, effective implementation of the policy occurs.
Should the implementation meet the metrics, then there is successful implementation of the policy.
The implementation meets the metrics, or there is partial success of the implementation.
Given that there is partial success of the implementation, it is not the case that there is an audit failure for the policy.
Whenever there is public support for the policy, if the policy is enacted, then the policy is successful.
In cases where there is positive polling for the policy, public support for the policy exists.
Should the time period occur during the legislation, then if the government has funding for the program, the government implements the policy.
If the time period has an insufficient budget, then it is not the case that the time period has an adequate budget.
Provided that the legislature passes legislation for the policy, the policy is successful.
Either the legislature passes legislation for the policy, or the executive approves legislation for the policy.
Whenever the executive approves legislation for the policy, the policy is enacted.
Should it not be the case that the executive's approval not leading to a successful policy implies the policy faces a legal challenge, then the policy is upheld by the court.

If it is not the case that the time period not occurring during the legislation implies no training requirement for the skill, and that does not lead to an inadequate budget for the time period, and that does not lead to a compliance audit for the policy, then there is an audit failure for the policy.
Provided that it is not the case that the time period not occurring during the legislation implies no training requirement for the skill, the time period has an adequate budget.
Should it not be the case that the time period not occurring during the legislation implies no training requirement for the skill, then the time period has an insufficient budget.
Whenever the time period does not occur during the legislation, the legislation requires training for the skill.
